ic-post-errors-to - The Post-Errors-To Attribute

Summary

The ic-post-errors-to attribute tells Intercooler to post all errors that occur during requests and content swapping to a given URL, typically for server side logging.

This attribute is typically specified on the body tag of your web application.

Syntax

The value of the attribute should be a valid URL (e.g. "/errors").

Dependencies

ic-post-errors-to has no dependency implications.

Example

Here is a simple example usage. All errors that occur within the body will be posted to the /errors url

  <body ic-post-errors-to="/errors">
    ...
  </body>
